name: two.5
description: Respond to user interactions with visual effects

scripts.demo:copy: cp demo/*.html docs/demo && cp -r demo/static docs/demo/static && cp -r demo/css docs/demo/css
scripts.demo:build: npm run demo:clear && npm run demo:copy && rollup -c rollup-demo.config.js
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run demo:build
scripts.demo:watch: npm run build -w && npm run demo:build -w
scripts.demo:start: npm run demo && npm run start
scripts.start:watch: npm run demo:watch && npm run start

author: Yehonatan Daniv
